title: Quiz 1: Console Investigation
description: Open the browser console and enter the secret key to proceed to the next quiz.

title: Quiz 2: Element Class Challenge
description: Inspect this element and enter the CSS class name applied to this description.

title: Quiz 3: Styling Detective
description: Check the computed styles for this element and enter the text style properties.

title: Quiz 4: Console Function Call
description: Run the 'getKey()' function in the console to retrieve the key for the next quiz.

title: Quiz 5: Session Storage Hunt
description: Retrieve the key stored in session storage and enter it to proceed.

title: Quiz 6: Payload Exploration
description: Click the button below, inspect the network request, and extract the key from the payload to advance.

title: Quiz 7: Local Storage Lookup
description: Find the key stored in local storage and input it here to continue.

title: Quiz 8: Loader Secret
description: The key for this quiz is hidden within the loader of this page. Discover it and move on.

title: Quiz 9: Token Unlock
description: Use the access token stored in local storage as an argument in the 'getKey()' function to reveal the final key.
